name: Grimvalor
overview: Grimvalor is an award-winning hack-n-slash action-platformer with compelling combat mechanics and exploration. Slice your way through the hordes of darkness and face King Valor's guardians as you delve deep into this darkvania! A malicious power stirs in the forgotten kingdom of Vallaris. Tasked with discovering the fate of its lost king, your quest quickly takes a sinister turn and you are cast into the abyss. Surrounded and outnumbered, you must grab your sword, steel your temper and fight your way through a land that does not welcome you. Except for the friendly merchant - he's grateful for your business. Key Features: • Hyper-Responsive Gameplay: Fluid mix of fast-paced combat and platforming. • Exploration & Treasure: Discover and upgrade powerful equipment and mysterious relics to unleash your full potential. • Challenging Boss Fights: Master skill-based combat, level up your character and bring down your enemies with all of your fury. • New Game+ Mode: Play through a reimagined world filled with ever more dangerous enemies and powerful equipment. Experience your journey anew!
